buyer_name: Mpumalanga Department of Agriculture, Rural Development Land and Environmental Affairs (DARDLEA)
items_description: Food Parcel Hamper ( Each Hamper include; 10kg mealie meal, 10KG rice, 1kg white suger, matchbox pack, pack of candles, 2L cooking oil, box of teabags, 3 heads of cabbages, 400g canned fish, 400g canned beans, 1kg full cream powdered milk, 7kg bag of potatoes and 7kg bag of onions)
The beneficiary targets and method of d: DARDLEA appointed Sabalala Food and Beverages to operationalise and manage the Mkhondo Agrihub. The Agrihub delivered 12700 food parcel hampers in Gert Sibande District through the DSD nerve centres. The demand for food parcels was presented by the nerve centre to DARDLEA and DARDLEA instructed the Agrihub to deliver as per the demand.

buyer_name: Mpumalanga Department of Agriculture, Rural Development Land and Environmental Affairs (DARDLEA)
items_description: Food Parcel Hamper ( Each Hamper include; 10kg mealie meal, 10KG rice, 1kg white suger, matchbox pack, pack of candles, 2L cooking oil, box of teabags, 3 heads of cabbages, 400g canned fish, 400g canned beans, 1kg full cream powdered milk, 7kg bag of potatoes and 7kg bag of onions)
The beneficiary targets and method of d: DARDLEA appointed Impumelelo Agribusiness Solutions to operationalise and manage the Mkhuhlu Agrihub. The Agrihub delivered 13000 food parcel hampers in Ehlanzeni District and 14300 in Nkangala District through the DSD nerve centre. The demand for food parcels was presented by the nerve centre to DARDLEA and DARDLEA instructed the AGRIHUB to deliver as per the demand
